citation: Proclamation under the Residential Tenancy Amendment Act 2011 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Residential Tenancy Amendment Act 2011

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Residential Tenancy Amendment Act 2011 fix 1 January 2012 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

5 December 2011

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

NICK McKIM

Minister for Corrections and Consumer Protection

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 14 December 2011

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
